name: pressspace
description: Pressspace is a one button typing game where you are in charge of putting the spaces in-between words! The conjoined words will scroll by automatically and its up to you to place the spaces properly so that they form words and tell a story. The more words you space our the higher your combo will go, and the faster things will get. If you liked it make sure to vote for it @ https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/pressspace!
